29 #if !(defined CRASHRPT_ENABLE_RELEASE_ASSERTS)
30 # define CRASHRPT_ENABLE_RELEASE_ASSERTS 1
42 # undef CRASHRPT_ENABLE_RELEASE_ASSERTS // this is to make doxygen document CRASHRPT_ENABLE_RELEASE_ASSERTS macro
43 #elif CRASHRPT_ENABLE_RELEASE_ASSERTS == 1
44 # include <assert.h>
45 # ifndef _DEBUG
46 # undef assert
47 # define assert(expr) ((void) (!(expr) && (crash_rpt::SkipDoctorDump_ReportAssertionViolation<__COUNTER__>(__FUNCTION__ ": "#expr " is false" ), true)))
48 # endif // !_DEBUG
49 #endif // CRASHRPT_ENABLE_RELEASE_ASSERTS
50 
51 namespace crash_rpt {
52 
53 namespace {
54 
55  // This template should be in anonymous namespace since __COUNTER__ is unique only for a single translation unit (as anonymous namespace items)
56  template<unsigned uniqueAssertId>
57  __forceinline static void SkipDoctorDump_ReportAssertionViolation(LPCSTR dumpGroup)
58  {
59  static LONG volatile isAlreadyReported = FALSE;
60  if (TRUE == InterlockedCompareExchange(&isAlreadyReported, TRUE, FALSE))
61  return;
62  ::RaiseException(CrashRpt::ExceptionAssertionViolated, 0, 1, reinterpret_cast<ULONG_PTR*>(&dumpGroup));
63  }
64 
65 } // namespace {

85 {

90  ExecuteHandler

216 class CrashRpt
217 {
218 public:
221 
224  CrashRpt(
225  LPCSTR applicationGUID,
226  LPCWSTR appName,
227  LPCWSTR company
228  ) throw()
229  {
230  if (!LoadDll())
231  return;
232 
233  InitCrashRpt(applicationGUID, NULL, appName, company, TRUE);
234  }
235 
238  CrashRpt(
239  LPCSTR applicationGUID,
240  LPCSTR prefix,
241  LPCWSTR appName,
242  LPCWSTR company,
243  BOOL ownProcess = TRUE
244  ) throw()
247  {
248  if (!LoadDll())
249  return;
250 
251  InitCrashRpt(applicationGUID, prefix, appName, company, ownProcess);
252  }
253 
256  CrashRpt(
257  LPCWSTR crashrptPath,
258  LPCSTR applicationGUID,
259  LPCSTR prefix,
260  LPCWSTR appName,
261  LPCWSTR company,
262  BOOL ownProcess = TRUE
263  ) throw()
266  {
267  if (!LoadDll(crashrptPath))
268  return;
269 
270  InitCrashRpt(applicationGUID, prefix, appName, company, ownProcess);
271  }
272 
275  CrashRpt(
276  ApplicationInfo* applicationInfo,
277  HandlerSettings* handlerSettings,
278  BOOL ownProcess = TRUE
279  ) throw()
282  {
283  if (!LoadDll())
284  return;
285 
286  InitCrashRpt(applicationInfo, handlerSettings, ownProcess);
287  }
288 
291  CrashRpt(
292  LPCWSTR crashrptPath,
293  ApplicationInfo* applicationInfo,
294  HandlerSettings* handlerSettings,
295  BOOL ownProcess = TRUE
296  ) throw()
299  {
300  if (!LoadDll(crashrptPath))
301  return;
302 
303  InitCrashRpt(applicationInfo, handlerSettings, ownProcess);
304  }
305 
306 
309  CrashRpt(
310  LPCWSTR crashrptPath = NULL
311  ) throw()
312  {
313  LoadDll(crashrptPath);
314  }
315 
319  ~CrashRpt()
320  {
321  if (!m_IsReadyToExit)
322  return;
323 
324  // If crash has happen not in main thread we should wait here until report will be sent
325  // or else program will be terminated after return from main() and report sending will be halted.
326  while (!m_IsReadyToExit())
327  ::Sleep(100);
328 
329 #if _WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0501 /*_WIN32_WINNT_WINXP*/
330  if (m_bSkipAssertsAdded)
331  RemoveVectoredExceptionHandler(SkipAsserts);
332 #endif
333  }
334 
337  bool IsCrashHandlingEnabled() const
338  {
339  return m_bWorking;
340  }
341 
345  bool InitCrashRpt(
346  ApplicationInfo* applicationInfo,
347  HandlerSettings* handlerSettings,
348  BOOL ownProcess = TRUE
349  ) throw()
352  {
353  if (!m_InitCrashRpt)
354  return false;
355 
356  m_bWorking = m_InitCrashRpt(applicationInfo, handlerSettings, ownProcess) != FALSE;
357 
358  return m_bWorking;
359  }
360 
364  __declspec(deprecated)
365  bool InitCrashHandler(
366  ApplicationInfo* applicationInfo,
367  HandlerSettings* handlerSettings,
368  BOOL ownProcess = TRUE
369  ) throw()
372  {
373  return InitCrashRpt(applicationInfo, handlerSettings, ownProcess);
374  }
375 
376 
380  bool InitCrashRpt(
381  LPCSTR applicationGUID,
382  LPCSTR prefix,
383  LPCWSTR appName,
384  LPCWSTR company,
385  BOOL ownProcess = TRUE
386  ) throw()
389  {
390  if (!m_GetVersionFromApp)
391  return false;
392 
393  ApplicationInfo appInfo;
394  memset(&appInfo, 0, sizeof(appInfo));
395  appInfo.ApplicationInfoSize = sizeof(appInfo);
396  appInfo.ApplicationGUID = applicationGUID;
397  appInfo.Prefix = prefix;
398  appInfo.AppName = appName;
399  appInfo.Company = company;
400  if (!m_GetVersionFromApp(&appInfo))
401  appInfo.V[0] = 1;
402 
403  HandlerSettings handlerSettings;
404  memset(&handlerSettings, 0, sizeof(handlerSettings));
405  handlerSettings.HandlerSettingsSize = sizeof(handlerSettings);
406  handlerSettings.OpenProblemInBrowser = TRUE;
407 
408  return InitCrashRpt(&appInfo, &handlerSettings, ownProcess);
409  }
410 
416  bool SetCustomInfo(
417  LPCWSTR text
418  )
419  {
420  if (!m_SetCustomInfo)
421  return false;
422  m_SetCustomInfo(text);
423  return true;
424  }
425 
429  bool AddUserInfoToReport(
430  LPCWSTR key,
431  LPCWSTR value
432  ) throw()
433  {
434  if (!m_AddUserInfoToReport)
435  return false;
436  m_AddUserInfoToReport(key, value);
437  return true;
438  }
439

448  return false;

450  return true;
451  }

458  LPCWSTR path,

460  ) throw()

462  if (!m_AddFileToReport)
463  return false;
464  m_AddFileToReport(path, reportFileName);
465  return true;
466  }

472  LPCWSTR path

476  return false;

478  return true;
479  }
480 
484  bool GetVersionFromApp(
485  ApplicationInfo* appInfo
486  ) throw()
487  {
488  if (!m_GetVersionFromApp)
489  return false;
490  return m_GetVersionFromApp(appInfo) != FALSE;
491  }
492 
495  bool GetVersionFromFile(
496  LPCWSTR path,
497  ApplicationInfo* appInfo
498  ) throw()
499  {
500  if (!m_GetVersionFromFile)
501  return false;
502  return m_GetVersionFromFile(path, appInfo) != FALSE;
503  }
504 
523  LONG SendReport(
524  EXCEPTION_POINTERS* exceptionPointers
525  )
527  {
528  if (!m_SendReport)
529  {
530  // There is no crash handler but asserts should not crash application anyway, so let's continue
531  if (exceptionPointers->ExceptionRecord->ExceptionCode == ExceptionAssertionViolated)
532  return EXCEPTION_CONTINUE_EXECUTION;
533  return EXCEPTION_CONTINUE_SEARCH;
534  }
535  return m_SendReport(exceptionPointers);
536  }
537 
546  static const DWORD ExceptionAssertionViolated = ((DWORD)0xCCE17000);
547 
549  static const DWORD ExceptionCppTerminate = ((DWORD)0xCCE17001);
550 
552  static const DWORD ExceptionPureCall = ((DWORD)0xCCE17002);
553 
555  static const DWORD ExceptionInvalidParameter = ((DWORD)0xCCE17003);
556 
561  void SkipDoctorDump_SendAssertionViolated(
562  LPCSTR dumpGroup = NULL
563  ) const
564  {
565  if (!m_bWorking)
566  return;
567  if (dumpGroup)
568  ::RaiseException(CrashRpt::ExceptionAssertionViolated, 0, 1, reinterpret_cast<ULONG_PTR*>(&dumpGroup));
569  else
570  ::RaiseException(CrashRpt::ExceptionAssertionViolated, 0, 0, NULL);
571  }
572 
573 private:
574  bool LoadDll(LPCWSTR crashrptPath = NULL) throw()
575  {
576  m_bLoaded = false;
577  m_bWorking = false;
578  m_bSkipAssertsAdded = false;
579  m_InitCrashRpt = NULL;
580  m_SendReport = NULL;
581  m_IsReadyToExit = NULL;
582  m_SetCustomInfo = NULL;
583  m_AddUserInfoToReport = NULL;
584  m_RemoveUserInfoFromReport = NULL;
585  m_AddFileToReport = NULL;
586  m_RemoveFileFromReport = NULL;
587  m_GetVersionFromApp = NULL;
588  m_GetVersionFromFile = NULL;
589 
590  // hCrashrptDll should not be unloaded, crash may appear even after return from main().
591  // So hCrashrptDll is not saved after construction.
592  HMODULE hCrashrptDll = ::LoadLibraryW(crashrptPath ? crashrptPath : L"crashrpt.dll");
593  if (hCrashrptDll != NULL)
594  {
595  m_InitCrashRpt = (pfnInitCrashRpt) GetProcAddress(hCrashrptDll, "InitCrashRpt");
596  m_SendReport = (pfnSendReport) GetProcAddress(hCrashrptDll, "SendReport");
597  m_IsReadyToExit = (pfnIsReadyToExit) GetProcAddress(hCrashrptDll, "IsReadyToExit");
598  m_SetCustomInfo = (pfnSetCustomInfo) GetProcAddress(hCrashrptDll, "SetCustomInfo");
599  m_AddUserInfoToReport = (pfnAddUserInfoToReport) GetProcAddress(hCrashrptDll, "AddUserInfoToReport");
600  m_RemoveUserInfoFromReport = (pfnRemoveUserInfoFromReport) GetProcAddress(hCrashrptDll, "RemoveUserInfoFromReport");
601  m_AddFileToReport = (pfnAddFileToReport) GetProcAddress(hCrashrptDll, "AddFileToReport");
602  m_RemoveFileFromReport = (pfnRemoveFileFromReport) GetProcAddress(hCrashrptDll, "RemoveFileFromReport");
603  m_GetVersionFromApp = (pfnGetVersionFromApp) GetProcAddress(hCrashrptDll, "GetVersionFromApp");
604  m_GetVersionFromFile = (pfnGetVersionFromFile) GetProcAddress(hCrashrptDll, "GetVersionFromFile");
605 
606  m_bLoaded = m_InitCrashRpt
607  && m_SendReport
608  && m_IsReadyToExit
609  && m_SetCustomInfo
610  && m_AddUserInfoToReport
611  && m_RemoveUserInfoFromReport
612  && m_AddFileToReport
613  && m_RemoveFileFromReport
614  && m_GetVersionFromApp
615  && m_GetVersionFromFile;
616  }
617 
618 #if _WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0501 /*_WIN32_WINNT_WINXP*/
619  // if no crash processing was started, we need to ignore ExceptionAssertionViolated exceptions.
620  if (!m_bLoaded)
621  {
622  ::AddVectoredExceptionHandler(TRUE, SkipAsserts);
623  m_bSkipAssertsAdded = true;
624  }
625 #endif
626 
627  return m_bLoaded;
628  }
629 
630  static LONG CALLBACK SkipAsserts(EXCEPTION_POINTERS* pExceptionInfo)
631  {
632  if (pExceptionInfo->ExceptionRecord->ExceptionCode == ExceptionAssertionViolated)
633  return EXCEPTION_CONTINUE_EXECUTION;
634  return EXCEPTION_CONTINUE_SEARCH;
635  }
636 
637  bool m_bLoaded;
638  bool m_bWorking;
639  bool m_bSkipAssertsAdded;
640 
641  typedef BOOL (__cdecl *pfnInitCrashRpt)(ApplicationInfo* applicationInfo, HandlerSettings* handlerSettings, BOOL ownProcess);
642  typedef LONG (__cdecl *pfnSendReport)(EXCEPTION_POINTERS* exceptionPointers);
643  typedef BOOL (__cdecl *pfnIsReadyToExit)();
644  typedef void (__cdecl *pfnSetCustomInfo)(LPCWSTR text);
645  typedef void (__cdecl *pfnAddUserInfoToReport)(LPCWSTR key, LPCWSTR value);
646  typedef void (__cdecl *pfnRemoveUserInfoFromReport)(LPCWSTR key);
647  typedef void (__cdecl *pfnAddFileToReport)(LPCWSTR path, LPCWSTR reportFileName /* = NULL */);
648  typedef void (__cdecl *pfnRemoveFileFromReport)(LPCWSTR path);
649  typedef BOOL (__cdecl *pfnGetVersionFromApp)(ApplicationInfo* appInfo);
650  typedef BOOL (__cdecl *pfnGetVersionFromFile)(LPCWSTR path, ApplicationInfo* appInfo);
651 
652  pfnInitCrashRpt m_InitCrashRpt;
653  pfnSendReport m_SendReport;
654  pfnIsReadyToExit m_IsReadyToExit;
655  pfnSetCustomInfo m_SetCustomInfo;
656  pfnAddUserInfoToReport m_AddUserInfoToReport;
657  pfnRemoveUserInfoFromReport m_RemoveUserInfoFromReport;
658  pfnAddFileToReport m_AddFileToReport;
659  pfnRemoveFileFromReport m_RemoveFileFromReport;
660  pfnGetVersionFromApp m_GetVersionFromApp;
661  pfnGetVersionFromFile m_GetVersionFromFile;
662 };
663 
664 } // namespace crash_rpt
